## Problem or motivation

A clear description of the problem you’re trying to solve or the use case you want to support (e.g. “As a QA lead, I want …”).

## Proposed solution

Describe the feature or change you’d like. If you have a concrete design (CLI flags, schema changes, etc.), outline it here.

## Alternatives considered

Any alternative solutions or workarounds you’ve considered.

## Additional context

Examples, mockups, or links to similar tools/features elsewhere.
